title: Computer Scientist
company: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (AI Accelerator Lab)
description: Refactored intranet-facing AI chatbot frontend into a lightweight React application, reducing bundle size from 20MB to 500KB and reducing lines of code by 75%, which delivered faster load times and simplified feature development.

Optimized transcription pipeline by benchmarking libraries and resolving memory bottlenecks, reducing processing time for 2-hour meetings from 45 minutes to 10 minutes

title: Associate AI Engineer

title: Software Developer

title: Full Stack Developer
